short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform text between English and Hebrew using a customizable keyboard shortcut.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple but quite useful tool to toggle between English and Hebrew while typing in the wrong language by accident.

*Are you a fast typer?*
(I'm not even sure if that's an actual word)
*THEN THIS IS THE TOOL FOR YOU*
Familiar with this annoying feeling mid/after typing when you realize that you typed your text in the wrong language and now you have to re-type it all again? well, no more!

with LangFixer you can replace your text with his corresponding letter in a blink of an eye.
Just type your keyboard shortcut to activate the extension and voil√†!
